name: Bitlone
description:
Have you ever had the feeling of being alone in a world full of leaks?
With Bitlone you will be projected in a digital world, where you will be a bit that need to collect all the "bitKeys" to unlock the door to go next level... but to unlock the game, you will need to solve all the puzzles and fix all the bugs.

There will be many types of puzzles, from the classical one to the encryption, math puzzle and optical effect but if you will win, you will get the real game, one of the hardest game of the world.

Two games in one app...

Enjoy it and Good Luck
